attributes.action: Refund are taxes from the banks or give the people the interest on amounts loaned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people are fed up with the attitude of the banks, we have helped them through a tough time and have had NO! reward in return, on our loans or mortgages. We want the desission reversed give us our money back or give the people the interest the banks are earning on what they have been given from us.
